sayfalar:
The Family and Time

This is a happy family. The man is the father and the woman is the mother. They have a boy and a girl. Every child plays in the park. They see many people there.

Time is important. One year has twelve months. One week has seven days.

Yesterday was cold. Today is a nice day. Tomorrow is a holiday.

In the morning, they go to school. In the evening, they eat dinner. At night, they sleep.
